overview: When Sara is served divorce papers while she is in New York, she is stunned. Not about to lose the fortune she amassed with her self-serving Texan husband, she makes an offer to her process server, Joe, that sets them off on a wild trip across the country.
tagline: The One Thing That Could Bring Them Together Is Revenge.
cast: Matthew Perry|Elizabeth Hurley|Vincent Pastore|Bruce Campbell|Cedric the Entertainer
